Trigger.Name: $ReadMeV1.02$
Trigger.Description: This utilizes Telesto To mark players and thus needs that. For instructions on how to install telesto. https://github.com/paissaheavyindustries/Dalamud-Repo

Folder.Name: Death of the HeavensPrioList - by King Pendragon & Jin

Trigger.Name: PriorityList (Move this up and down for prio)

Action.Description: DON'T TOUCH THIS, LEAVE AT TOP!

Action.JsonPayloadExpression: {"version": 1, "id": 1, "type": "Bundle", "payload": [ {"version": 1, "id": 2, "type": "ExecuteCommand", "payload": {"command": "/mk off <1>"}}, {"version": 1, "id": 3, "type": "ExecuteCommand", "payload": {"command": "/mk off <2>"}}, {"version": 1, "id": 4, "type": "ExecuteCommand", "payload": {"command": "/mk off <3>"}}, {"version": 1, "id": 5, "type": "ExecuteCommand", "payload": {"command": "/mk off <4>"}}, {"version": 1, "id": 6, "type": "ExecuteCommand", "payload": {"command": "/mk off <5>"}}, {"version": 1, "id": 7, "type": "ExecuteCommand", "payload": {"command": "/mk off <6>"}}, {"version": 1, "id": 8, "type": "ExecuteCommand", "payload": {"command": "/mk off <7>"}}, {"version": 1, "id": 9, "type": "ExecuteCommand", "payload": {"command": "/mk off <8>"}}]}

Trigger.Name: Telesto: Mark Doom No Doom (change JSON payload to change marks)

Action.JsonPayloadExpression: {"version": 1, "id": 1, "type": "Bundle", "payload": [ { "id": 2, "type": "ExecuteCommand", "payload": {"command": "/mk ignore1 <${plvar:TelestoPartyMembers.indexof(${lvar:DotHDoomList[1]})}>" } }, { "id": 3, "type": "ExecuteCommand", "payload": {"command": "/mk bind1 <${plvar:TelestoPartyMembers.indexof(${lvar:DotHDoomList[2]})}>" } }, { "id": 4, "type": "ExecuteCommand", "payload": {"command": "/mk bind2 <${plvar:TelestoPartyMembers.indexof(${lvar:DotHDoomList[3]})}>" } }, { "id": 5, "type": "ExecuteCommand", "payload": {"command": "/mk ignore2 <${plvar:TelestoPartyMembers.indexof(${lvar:DotHDoomList[4]})}>" } }, { "id": 6, "type": "ExecuteCommand", "payload": {"command": "/mk attack1 <${plvar:TelestoPartyMembers.indexof(${lvar:DotHNoDoomList[1]})}>" } }, { "id": 7, "type": "ExecuteCommand", "payload": {"command": "/mk attack2 <${plvar:TelestoPartyMembers.indexof(${lvar:DotHNoDoomList[2]})}>" } }, { "id": 8, "type": "ExecuteCommand", "payload": {"command": "/mk attack3 <${plvar:TelestoPartyMembers.indexof(${lvar:DotHNoDoomList[3]})}>" } }, { "id": 9, "type": "ExecuteCommand", "payload": {"command": "/mk attack4 <${plvar:TelestoPartyMembers.indexof(${lvar:DotHNoDoomList[4]})}>" } } ] }
Action.Description: Mark Players (Change JSON payload to change which marks are used)

Folder.Name: Neri JP TEA Wormhole (based on @Aya) 3.0 EN

Action.Description: 87,113 or 87,87 call right 113,113 or 113,87 call left
87,113 or 87,87 call right 113,113 or 113,87 call left
